keepConnect.name: Khalani olumikizidwa
keepConnect.helperText: Ngati mumadina pa loyambira, kenako pitilizani ulalo. Izi zimafunikira chisamaliro kuti ulalo udzalumikizidwa mosalekeza pambuyo posiyidwa.

url.name: Ulalo
url.helperText: Ulalo ulalo, mwachitsanzo ws: //192.168.168.2: 7001, kapena wws: //example.com/path
url.error: Ulalo woyenera ndi ulalo woyambira ndi WS: // kapena WWS: //
